name: Tempo with Accelerations #2
description:
Building upon the previous 'Tempo With Accelerations' session, this time, we are extending the tempo portion to add a little more fatigue. Incorporating sprint efforts into a steady-state interval will recruit additional muscle fibres and develop their ability to work aerobically. 



The sprint efforts increase in duration from 15sec to 20sec and 30sec.
